thread.title: Man United fans think Jose Mourinho had a message for Anthony Martial | 101 Great Goals
thread.title_full: Man United fans think Jose Mourinho had a message for Anthony Martial | 101 Great Goals

title: Man United fans think Jose Mourinho had a message for Anthony Martial | 101 Great Goals
text:
Man United fans think Jose Mourinho had a message for Anthony Martial By Ben Green on Sunday, February 5, 2017 Leicester 0 – Manchester United 3 
Manchester United made ground on Arsenal and Liverpool on Sunday with a convincing 3-0 win over Leicester at the King Power Stadium. 
Goals from Henrikh Mkhitaryan, Zlatan Ibrahimovic and Juan Mata secured a comfortable win for Jose Mourinho’s side against the champions, who look like relegation fodder with every passing week. 
There was however one negative aspect for Manchester United fans to worry about: Anthony Martial. 
The Frenchman has struggled for first team opportunities this season despite a brilliant first campaign at Old Trafford. Is Jose Mourinho sending a message to Anthony Martial? 
Manchester United supporters were concerned when Martial was not in the starting line-up and then Jose Mourinho appeared to send another message to the former Monaco striker during the game. 
The Special One made three substitutions. Daley Blind came on for Marcos Rojo at half-time. Marouane Fellaini replaced Juan Mata with 13 minutes remaining. 
And, finally, Anthony Martial watched on as Ashley Young replaced Marcus Rashford. 
If, Jose Mourinho is sending a message to Anthony Martial, it feels like it is being delivered in a particularly harsh manner! That's a message to Martial if ever I've seen one, Young coming on for Rashford. 
— Alex Shaw (@AlexShawESPN) February 5, 2017 NO ANTHONY MARTIAL AGAIN. 
Gotta horrible feeling he won't be here next season. Would hate for that to happen! #LEIMUN #MatchdayMac 
— Full Time DEVILS (@FullTimeDEVILS) February 5, 2017 Ashley Young comes on in place of Marcus Rashford instead of Anthony Martial. There is something deeply wrong going on with Martial. Uh oh.
